      Phase 1: Activate the correctly predictive cells Pseudocode: - for each previous predictive cell - if in active column - mark it as active - mark it as winner cell - mark column as predicted - if not in active column - mark it as a predicted but inactive cell

      Phase 1: Activate the correctly predictive cells Pseudocode: - for each previous predictive cell - if in active column - mark it as active - mark it as winner cell - mark column as predicted - if not in active column - mark it as a predicted but inactive cell
